name: PlateCalculatorGymAssistant
0:
”Alexa, open plate calculator”
”Alexa, calculate plates for me”
”Alexa, help me calculate plates”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: plate calculator
des:
Plate math at the gym can get quite difficult, especially when you're exhausted mid workout - now Alexa can help! With this skill, Alexa can help you calculate which plates to place on each side of the bar to make the correct weight for you workout. Using a non-traditional bar, or do you use Kilogram units? You can change the default bar weight and units to fit your needs!

Note: Hopefully this app is helpful, but I'm not monetizing the skill and it's meant to be a portfolio project for myself, see: https://stewart-m-holloway.github.io/. If you do find it helpful, but would like to see more features, please let me know and I'll do my best!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
